website_summaries.verdict: These green coffee extract capsules are designed to boost your energy and metabolism while stabilizing your blood sugar levels and assisting with weight loss.
pros: Flush fat from the liver with a fat-blocking enzyme
High levels of caffeine serve as an appetite suppressant
Users report subtle effects and not heart-pounding bursts of energy
cons: Reports of broken pills upon arrival
Select users report constipation and headaches

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Products
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best GCB products you can get on the market. I have used products in the past but most don't even compare. I have lost weight slowly but steady and safely with a physicians recommended weight loss at 4 pounds. I will definitely reach my goal to lose 20 pounds by February and will slim down by the summer. I'm not on the heavy side and have a really great BMI but I like being a really slender build. I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Burrell

customer_reviews.title: much needed energy
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic fatigue and it was getting worse. I was managing by taking caffeine pills, but then bloodwork showed adrenals not working properly. Long story short, that form of caffeine was contributing to the problem! I had to get off of it, which landed me in bed most of the time. This, along with NADH, has gotten me back on my feet! And my adrenals are healing so each day is just a bit better. I find this helps for several hours at a time with no jittery feel and crash afterward. I do need to take with some food, though... not on an empty stomach for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mobile in TX

customer_reviews.title: Nature Berg Green Coffee Bean is a great product! and significantly decreased my appetite!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a great experience with this product! So far I have been taking this product for 5 months. I was provided with higher energy without feeling jumpy and I noticed that I didn't feel a need to eat as much. Yes my appetite has decreased. I don't even feel hungry between meals! This pill has been amazing for me, because I love to eat! I made a good choice purchasing this product and will buy again.Good product, shipped fast, at fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn's Voyage

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product to other people looking for help with ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with the Garcinia Cambogia from the same manufacturer. Along with diet and exercise, I've lost 55 lbs in 10 months. I would highly recommend this product to other people looking for help with energy and appetite suppression.
customer_reviews.author: SHall

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Haven't seen any weight drop off but that was more because I hadn't started. It does curve cravings and it really helped me get into my diet so I didn't start cold turkey. For the last few days the weight has started to drop and in one week I dropped 2 lbs. I like this product and will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Advertising! No Price per Count
customer_reviews.text: Will NOT be buying this "Amazon's Choice" again...thought I was getting 180 count. Only received 60 count! Fool me once, shame on you...fool me twice, shame on me! Will buy the competitor with 180 count next time (as I did last order, but was relying on "Amazon's Choice" label and the photo of 3 bottles). BAD ADVERTISING, AMAZON!! Gave it a 1 since it would NOT allow a "0" rating (bad, again, Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: John Granger

customer_reviews.title: Brain boost, cognitive improvement, memory and learning benefits found in green coffee fruit.
customer_reviews.text: One capsule of Nature's Craft Green Coffee Bean Extract contains 400 mgs of green coffee extract. That is huge. Other products generally contain about 100 mgs per capsule. Clinical studies show that Green coffee extract is more than a metabolic booster. Green coffee extract has been shown to support memory, focus, learning, and concentration. Compare this 400 mgs amount to the 100 mgs found in competing products, such as Neuriva. Such a great value for the price. I hope this company will consider offering a decaf version of their product. As other vendors do offer a decaf version. Neuriva for one example.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been using it for 2 years, gives me energy and has helped me loose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Helps me lose weight
customer_reviews.text: I love that this actually works. The pros- energy boost with the caffeine in it without making my heart race. Doesn’t give me any side effects (like lots of extra bathroom trips). Cons- wish there was a larger size of this so I didn’t have to order so often. Don’t be afraid to try this, I have used many different diet products and this is one of the few that I actually love.
customer_reviews.author: M SusanneA

customer_reviews.title: Does absolutely Nothing!  Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product in the past with no measurable results. I am giving it another try. I understand it has many potential health benefits. Worth another try. Will update later. Update:. Once again, I had Zero results with this product. It does not curb appetite nor does it aid in weight loss. The company offers a free bottle in exchange for a positive review, which may explain other glowing reviews, but I wanted to make sure there was at least one completely honest review here for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: freedom girl

customer_reviews.title: Did not work!
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I purchased coffee bean extract pills and the results were amazing. Thinking these pills would have the same result, I took them for a full month. I did not lose a single pound but quite the opposite, I gained weight. The pills made me incredibly hungry and anxious which probably explains why I gained weight.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia P Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I just started taking these a few days ago. I typically would have a cup of coffee in the morning, would eat breakfast by 9 a.m., then have an energy drink. Now I have a cup of coffee, and take one of these with a glass of water. Every day I realized it was nearly lunch time before I thought about eating and I'm fully energized. I have not even thought once about have an energy drink (which is great because energy drinks are expensive and deemed bad for me). I do recommend this product! I just set up for subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: jalapenohelen

customer_reviews.title: More Energy & Higher Stamina + Mind Clarity
customer_reviews.text: This product is like any other green coffee bean supplement out there. This supplement alone, I did not notice weight loss. What I notice is a clearer mind, more energy, and higher stamina. This product taken daily seems to support a quality lifestyle of healthy living. I would recommend if you need an energy boost, calmer life, or more nutritional antioxidant support. I picked this particular brand based on the good reviews as well as the price per tablet being extremely priced well. I look for the highest quality supplement at the best price and this product seemed to match.
customer_reviews.author: L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: These capsules are pretty gentle and gives me the right amount of energy ...
customer_reviews.text: These capsules are pretty gentle and gives me the right amount of energy in the morning. Usually products with caffeine make me a little jittery and slightly nauseas but no problem with these ones. No GI side effects for me either. They definitely hold my appetite over for a few hours. Will get another bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Yue

customer_reviews.title: I've lost 12 pounds
customer_reviews.text: When I was in my thirties and my mom in her 60's with a bit of a pot belly, I swore I'd never let myself get a gut and if I did I'd do sit ups till I trimmed down. Well, I'm now in my 60's with a bit of a gut and guess what, Not even interested in doing sit ups. I tried this product and I've lost 12 pounds! I'm so happy to have tried this and need to order more. My belly has flattened some and I'm sure it is a result of using this Green Coffee Bean Extract.
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Took this for almost two months and it did absolutely nothing except make me moody, and anxious. Probably from the extra caffeine In it. It in no way suppressed my appetite like it claims. Total waste of money. They did offer to send me a free bottle if I wrote them a good review. I found that interesting....
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe what you see.
customer_reviews.text: When you look at this on the website it looks like you get 3 bottles. It DOESN"T SAY ANYWHERE how many capsules or bottles you will receive. Really false advertising, bait and switch, whatever you want to call it . NOBODY likes to feel they've been deceived and that's exactly how I feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hughes

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I did notice a difference in my body after a few weeks. I did not right away so don't know if anyone should expect that. Without getting into too much detail in what I noticed, I did notice a difference. And this is the only thing I did different. I am ordering again. I do not write reviews unless something works or does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: i definitely feel an energy boost and after about 2 weeks I start to lose weight gradually which I think is the best way even though I’m impatient.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: This product works for maintaining on cheat days!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about these supplements! I have used them for years while doing a low carb diet, and if I know I'm going to eat something that I shouldn't or indulge myself with some desserts I pop one of these pills and I know that it will take care of the extra calories, fat and carbs for me. I have maintained my weight and figure while eating low carb and using these on Cheat Days. There are no side effects, they are easy to swallow and the price can't be beat for a little piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Heft

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I learnt about Green Coffee reading Dr Purmutter's Grain Brain. I made a short research and head stright to amazon. To my surprise I found lot of vendors offering the product. I ordered mine from Nature Berg and so far i am very pleased with the way it is working. Of course I have to come back to write a better review after I finish taking this suplement . I would like to see if it keep delivering the way it is right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard crash
customer_reviews.text: These caffeine pill give you energy for about 2 hours max, and then you crash really hard. It helps to avoid the crash if you keep sipping on coffee or tea. However at around 5/6pm I usually do not want any cafeinatted drink, so tiredness really catches up and I cannot stay awake. I think I'll stick with drinking coffee or tea, because at least then I don't feel a need to taka a nap as soon as the caffeine supply is over.
customer_reviews.author: Aiste

customer_reviews.title: Increase Metabolism
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Green Coffee for about a month now. I notice that without making any major changes in my diet, I have been losing about 1 a week. Must be working on my metabolism. I plan to order another bottle, plus increase my movement and exercise for better results.
customer_reviews.author: Patti from Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: .5lb each day
customer_reviews.text: Green coffee bean extract works for me. When I take it in the morning I’m always down a percentage of a pound the next day. If I don’t take it, I don’t lose, or I’ll gain. It’s the only thing that seems consistent for me. This particular brand is ok, but not as good as other brands I have tried. ***changing my review to 2 stars. This company says they will send you a free bottle if you review there product. I followed all the steps but only received the original 1 bottle. It’s just a ploy to receive good reviews. Beware! Not an honest company.
customer_reviews.author: Booksbiz

customer_reviews.title: One bottle in envelope
customer_reviews.text: The package came in an envelope only the bottle not actually container as shown. Just a bottle of pills. When purchase this there was a picture of 3 bottles and its original packaging. But one bottle for 15.98 I could have going to Walgreens instead. I haven't takin any of the pills but I'll be back to update on how or if the pills actually worked
customer_reviews.author: Darline G.

customer_reviews.title: Added Health Benefits!!!
customer_reviews.text: After my favorite blogger recommended green coffee extract beans as a supplement, I purchased these from Amazon. First, it isn't a weight loss magic pill -- you won't lose 10+ lbs taking this. However, taken with exercise and healthy eating I have seen a significant increase in my metabolism. I also am less bloated when I take them consistently. I would say these help when you have reached a plateau! Combined with my other health regimen, I have been able to shed 2-3 tough lbs. that I wasn't able to before. I recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy A Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Promotes weight loss with good pricing.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Nature Berg Green Coffee Been Extract for over a month and it has proven to promote weight loss by boosting my metabolism. The product also is a good value with good pricing.
customer_reviews.author: LUFlame

customer_reviews.title: Great ALA, and easy to take
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. The pill isn't S big that it was hard to swallow. It has no taste,or smelllt it. Godo to help keep blood sugar under control, and also a great immune support. He,so nerve function, as well as good for your eyes, and helps to absorb vitamin c, and e. You won't regret taking it, definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Joy S Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: I used this product to help me move on with  a healthier lifestyle.
customer_reviews.text: I had had a bad gay of weight after my back surgery, I have had no energy at all, I tried this green coffee and noticed my energy levels were getting better, and I started walking, I just recently received my 2 nd back surgery and I plan to use the green coffee to get my energy levels back up so I don't get the same weight gain I got from the first surgery. I know it helped me tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Breslau

customer_reviews.title: I've lost 44 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: I've lost 44 lbs in the last 4 1/2 months with the help of this product, and by controlling my daily caloric intake. If you want to cut your appetite, this green coffee extract is one way to go. I start my day with 2 capsules first thing each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Will Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: THIS GCB extract WORKED!
customer_reviews.text: I have taken a few different GCB extract supplements over last 2 years and this one, by far, is the most effective. I take in the morning and in afternoon, before meals. Sometimes I do in evening before dinner, but not often, since the 2 doses usually work thru the day and I often don't feel hungry. I do take this with garcinia cambogia when I need a boost, but the GCB from Nature Berg DOES work!
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Feel the difference, energy boosting supplement I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 2 weeks now I feel more energetic then before using this product I notice that I wake up now without feeling lethargic anymore and without taking naps after waking up. And I am noticing less cravings for sugar and candy. I didn't measure my weight yet but I will update this review for updates on weight loss after I finish my bottle for accurate review.
customer_reviews.author: Hanan Khan

customer_reviews.title: Curb Your Appetite
customer_reviews.text: I used the product before breakfast and before lunch. I didn't do dinner because of the caffeine. It worked well to curb my appetite and I did feel like I had more energy. I do believe it does affect metabolism as I was feeling a bit warmer than usual and had to dress lighter even in winter. Little weight loss, however, I admit that I didn't exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Gooch

customer_reviews.title: It Helps!
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to give up coffee and Monster energy drinks while also losing a little weight. The Natures Craft green coffee bean extract has given me the needed kick to get through the day. Not sure about them helping with weight loss but I have lost 10 lbs. since I started taking them and following a somewhat Keto diet. I'm definitely going to continue using them.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: No jitters and actually keeps appetite suppressed
customer_reviews.text: Must confess I didn't think these would work, but figured I'd give a try. They do work as long as I take first thing in the a.m. and at least 30 minutes before my first meal. I find my appetite is there, though not as voracious as it normally would be. Happy they work for me and will continue to use as long as I feel they do.
customer_reviews.author: FTE

customer_reviews.title: Smooth energy lift
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned whether this product may give me the jitters. I am glad to say that it does not. It gives a smooth mild energy boost that seems to last most of the day; unlike the spike and crash of a cup of coffee. So, I feel comfortable giving this product a good couple months try-out to see how it works for fat burning.
customer_reviews.author: jfk

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually works! Very surprised how much it helped me cut back on not eating as much. I always try and drink a glass of water before eating but did not work as well until i got this! Love love love! Amazing results!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing energy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking the Green Coffee Bean Extract for several months now and really love the results! I take it before my first meal and it gives me an amazing boost of energy for the afternoon! I've noticed some weight loss as well. I haven't even increased my dose to two pills a day (recommended) but am sure it'll be even better results when I do!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lynn Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product For It's Price
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of other products with little success. I am very happy with this product. Not only does it curb my appetite but it gets rid of the groggy feeling I have when I wake up. It gives me the energy and mental clarity I need to start my days. When I finally reach my weight goal, I will continue using it just for the energy and mental boost. Wasn't sure if I should rate flavor category but i also gave 5* for flavor because there is no taste or aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: GusHatzi

customer_reviews.title: Became Routine, Felt Weird Without it
customer_reviews.text: Took one a day for 60 days and within a few weeks I felt pretty good. More awake, a little more energy, it felt right. I can't report any substantial weight loss (lost maybe a few pounds but nothing big), but considering I wasn't very physically active, I didn't gain any weight either. Curious to see what taking this product for an extended period of time when I get back to my gym routine.
customer_reviews.author: seandog

customer_reviews.title: It actually does work
customer_reviews.text: I have no health problems, and I am not obese. My friend suggested I add this to my daily vitamin routine, and I do feel that I have been keeping off the last five pounds that I've been trying to work off over the past few months. Definitely worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: WenB

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different brands over the years. Took a break from GCB, and then started again last month with this one. So far, so good. No issues with product or packaging. All capsules look the same with same fill. This is not a miracle pill, but I do think it helps. Put enough things together (less wine, more vegetables, exercise and supplements) and you will see the difference. I just placed a second order. I do think the price is right, you don't need to pay more to get a better product, this is right in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: annemarie rynearson

customer_reviews.title: More Energy and Better Eating Habits.
customer_reviews.text: Since taking these supplements I have been getting that pep in my step I have been needing to get me going. And since it has to taken 30 mins before your meal and you find yourself needing to time things right. it has made me eat at more regular intervals. which is, in as of itself, a healthier thing to do than eating whenever you can or will. my body has gotten into a rhythm and with these pills, I have the energy can dance to that rhythm.
customer_reviews.author: Zer0

customer_reviews.title: I've had a great experience with this product
customer_reviews.text: I've had a great experience with this product! I am provided with higher energy without feel a need to eat as much and my appetite has decreased. I don't even feel hungry between meals! This pill has been amazing for me, because I love to eat! I made a good choice purchasing this product and will buy again. Good product, shipped fast, fair price and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Pennati

customer_reviews.title: No negative side effects for an extremely allergic/sensitive person
customer_reviews.text: My acupuncturist suggested I start taking to jumpstart my metabolism. The reason only 4Stars, is would prefer if Organic and if a decaf option(which is actually what was prescribed)...just purchased 2 more bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I might have a little more energy
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t noticed that these have helped curb my appetite or loose any weight. I feel like I might have a little more energy, but not overly energized. Although, I do like that these don’t make me feel jittery or anything. I feel normal when taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I started to tack Alpha because of my Nerve Damage from an accident back in 2006. In all the years I could not find anything to help till I found Alpha being sold by Nature Berg But, I could not find them again until Nature's Craft came along. Natures Craft also has the same label which helps be to remember that I am taking Alpha.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised- great for a morning boost!
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to cut my morning Dunkin' run from my routine as of late- too expensive, and I'm tired of waiting in line- so I decided to give this a try. Let me tell ya- it's great for giving me that little extra "pep-in-my-step" every morning. Works great with my vitamin regimen to keep me going all day. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kawalec

customer_reviews.title: The science seems to back it, and no side-effects.
customer_reviews.text: I did some research into supplements that increase metabolism and reduce appetite, and green coffee bean extract is just about the only one that has some legitimate scientific backing. I'm taking these now, and they're easy to swallow, don't taste of anything, and don't seem to be affecting me negatively at all. I have no idea if they're contributing to weight loss: I'm definitely losing weight, but I'm also dieting and exercising, so who knows? They're not doing any harm though.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Clements

customer_reviews.title: Nice energy boost and makes me feel awake
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate this product because I do not drink coffee which has so many benefits as opposed to caffeinated soda. I talk one of these tablets in the morning and I feel like I had a cup of coffee, without my heart beating too fast or any of the other annoying side effects that coffee has. I would definitely buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: My Green Coffee Extract
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Nature's Craft Green Coffee Bean Extract based on the recommendation of Dr. Frank Shallenberger's opinion, and I'm glad I did. I take the supplement with my morning "Bulletproof" coffee. My hope is to significantly increase chlorogenic acid because I am diabetic. Regards, John Malpass
customer_reviews.author: John R Malpass

customer_reviews.title: No difference for me
customer_reviews.text: Haven't noticed any difference. There has be no appetite suppression and I think I've actually gained weight. I am also wary when supplements leave a website on their bottle to get a free bottle if they visit their website. Be careful of reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jdiesel77

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help for weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking a single capsule in the morning for 2 months. In combination with intermittent fasting I have started to see results, shedding about 5-6 lbs in that period. However, I had been losing weight (already up to 20 lbs) prior to taking these supplements, so I am not quite sure if they are an underlying cause, but I do believe they help to accelerate your metabolism. Will probably purchase again and increase my dosage to two a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really helps suppress my appetite
customer_reviews.text: Ive been taking this for about 3-4 months and it really helps suppress my appetite. I can notice a difference if I don’t take it like I’m supposed to. I’ve used a few different brands of green coffee bean extract and this one is my personal favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy-the-Crow

customer_reviews.title: More Energy- No Jitters
customer_reviews.text: I took this product trying to lose about 10 lbs quickly before an event. I took this product along with vitamin B12 and Garcinia Cambogia and have lost 3 lbs in 4 days. It appears that when used with a healthy diet and exercise routine, the product really works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works like its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: since ive been taking this for the last month i dont need to drink my morning coffee to wake up and ive lost 5 pounds. this is cheaper than drinking a cup of coffee per day and the chlorogenic acid in it helps you lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Time User  No Major Complaints
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the product for almost 30 days now. Cannot tell you if it made much of a difference, but it does seem to suppress appetite and seems to speed up metabolism. I do recommend you follow the directions and eat at least 20-30 minutes before eating for maximum effect. I am still assessing whether I will buy again, but no major complaints
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop taking these. I got a little boost of energy. Did nothing to hunger suppression. They ruined my mood, and made me easily aggravated. Not for me. Stopped taking them and the issue went away.
customer_reviews.author: alcatelh8er

customer_reviews.title: I found that this product didnt give me any effect
customer_reviews.text: I was using this product for more of an energy booster and diet and I didnt feel any change in appetite nor in my energy.
customer_reviews.author: kimberley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good i guess
customer_reviews.text: The pills are fairly easy to swallow. I do feel more energetic during the day, but I also consume a lot of caffeine already. I do believe that these pills have helped me burn some more fat than regularly, but these are not miracle pills. You do need to pair these as a supplement with proper exercise and diet. I did not rate the flavor since it has none, which I consider good. Value for money, i do believe that you get a proper amount of pills.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: energy
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to give me a bit more energy. I did not lose weight yet. I would like to try it out for another month to be sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra Going throughout the day
customer_reviews.text: My husband heard about Green Coffee Bean Extract at work and we decided to try Nature Berg 800 mg for that "extra" boost in energy and mental clarity in the early afternoon. Now, my husband keeps a bottle handy at work. It works. That's the great thing. We'll be getting more of this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeananne

customer_reviews.title: Leaves me full and content
customer_reviews.text: So I had about a week or so to really give this a try. I’ve used other dietary supplements in the past, but most had me walking around jittery. I wanted to find something that would not get my heart racing and I think I found it with this product. Again it’s only been a little over a week, but I have no awful feelings that I’ve had with other products. This here leaves me feeling full.
customer_reviews.author: Lopeezy

customer_reviews.title: Jury is out
customer_reviews.text: Finished a whole bottle. Not sure if it is making a difference. No I’ll side effects.
customer_reviews.author: New Mama

customer_reviews.title: Definitely gives me energy
customer_reviews.text: I slept at about 6am last night, woke up at like 1pm. Took the pill, and usually i need a nap mid day but didn't. I didn't even fell hungry today and usually I'm munching on some snacks. I will definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Vichaidit

customer_reviews.title: Energy and weightloss
customer_reviews.text: There is a noticeable, sustained energy boost. Weight loss is also occurring. I also like that that the indication is just 1 capsule, twice a day, where many other similar products have that doubled. Seems to be a good product!
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopperSCM

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth trying
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! Just the right amount of alertness that helps me to get through my day. I have slowly slimmed down in trouble areas and I actually stopped stress eating. Clean, well balanced meals came easier to me once starting this product. This is not my first time purchasing and it will not be my last.
customer_reviews.author: angela f

customer_reviews.title: Weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product in combination with Garcinia Cambogia and I have lost about 20 pounds in 5 months. I am not sure which supplement is responsible for the weight loss or if it is the combination of the two, but I am going to continue taking them until I lose 20 more pounds. Only thing is, the weight loss has slowed down recently, but I'm not losing hope.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte beck

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd product like this that I have taken. This one absolutely works so much better than the other. I will be getting another bottle soon! It gives me lasting energy and I don't crash after..... I was going to the gym at 5am then going to work at my full time job(desk job), AND THEN my part time job( grocery shopping for others) with a nice steady energy level. It worked great for me!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Might Just Work
customer_reviews.text: I recently just discovered green coffee as an ingredient in a drink I ordered at a coffee shop and liked the way it made feel energized but not jittery. I'm just finishing my first bottle of this extract and I'm hoping it really does help with the weight loss. I have certainly lost weight, but I started using this product at the same time I started a diet and exercise routine so it is hard to say what is helping most. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Keeps.you lean!
customer_reviews.text: After taking this supplement for a month I candefinitely say I feel like it boosted my metabolism. I had recently lost a significant amount of weight by going low carb and trying some intermittent fasting. I felt as though the green coffee been extract gave me an edge and helped me stay leaner during a month that I wasn’t fasting as much or keeping the carbs as low as I should have. It’s a great addition to this eating strategy and I will continue to use it for it’s antioxidant benefits as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nature's craft green coffee bean gives me energy needed during the day
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive nature Berg, I got nature's craft. This particular herb works for weight loss in conjunction with eating right and exercise . Works well helping Me maintain energy as I suffer with a chronic pain condition that causes energy loss during the day
customer_reviews.author: Freya

customer_reviews.title: Nice boost
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I just needed a jump start after eating my way through the pandemic! I'm already less bloated and maybe a pound or 2 lighter. Haven't changed anything yet except adding gr coffee bean. And I haven't noticed it keeping me up if I take it too late. Works best if you take it with a full glass of water!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product to give me the energy I need to get through tough workouts. I can no longer drink coffee to reap the benefits of caffeine so I find that this is a good substitute. It provides all the energy but without the jitters. I recommend it to anyone who needs a bit of a lift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for fasting
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten multiple bottles of this product over the years and I can definitely tell a difference in my appetite when I take these and when I dont take these. I intermittent fast alot and taking just one of these can reduce/eliminate my hunger for another few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great for subtle energy and curbed appetite
customer_reviews.text: I noticed I had sustained energy on the days that I took Green Coffee Bean. I take it together with Garcinia Cambogia. I truly believe it is an effective weight management aid when used with healthy diet modification.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Henderson

customer_reviews.title: They are a great supplement
customer_reviews.text: These are a great supplement to using self control, eating healthy and exercising. They do help curb the appetite and the capsules are somewhat large but easy to swallow. They do contain caffeine but only equal to half a cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia

customer_reviews.title: Totally ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Tried using this as a less expensive alternative to Life Science brand which costs twice as much, but these do nothing for me. No appetite suppression and no increased energy. I guess it's just a case of getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: K100998

customer_reviews.title: Finally losing weight
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for months to lose weight. After taking this for 1 month I finally lost weight....10 lbs. I don't have time to exercise. I stay hydrated and take these twice a day 30 minutes before eating as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Leon

customer_reviews.title: 50% GCA; good product!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly like Nature Berg’s green coffee bean extract. I used to use another brand at 45% GCA. That extra 5% makes a difference. To maintain my metabolism and maximize my workouts, I take 1600 mg/day. Taking one capsule in the evening also helps to curb the nightly munchies. I recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Stung66

customer_reviews.title: Good for people which has high cholesterol.
customer_reviews.text: I got very high cholesterol (8.5mmol/L). Have just finished the first bottle of coffee bean and my new test result on yesterday was incredible. My new cholesterol is 2.7mmol/L. It's over my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Hai N.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken green coffee bean in the past and have seen results. This product didn’t disappoint. I pair it with CLA and exercise moderately about 3 times a week. I’ve lost 7lbs in the past two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: I think it's making a slight difference in fat burning, but I can't say I've been faithful with taking 2 doses a day. No side effects, which is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Natural Raw Green Coffee Bean Extract gives your metabolism a boost
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product that was easy to take, had no after taste and gave my metabolism the boost I needed to progress in my weight loss. Natural Raw Green Coffee Bean Extract has been just what I needed, it has helped me have more energy and get up go. This is what I needed to get my weight loss jump started. I'd recommend it to anyone needing a kick start to weight loss and increased energy.
customer_reviews.author: Libragal

customer_reviews.title: facilitate weight loss
customer_reviews.text: This product teaches you good habits while making you feel like you're riding a bike tandem - with someone else helping you make progress! Before eating, you need to wait 1/2 hour after taking your pill, which teaches you a bit of self-control. I have needed to cut down on my portions somewhat, but - this product has made losing weight a whole lot easier. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Debbie

customer_reviews.title: A Natural Carbs Blocker That Appears To Work...
customer_reviews.text: Since cutting my carbs eating along with taking these this supplements, I've lost roughly 5 lbs. I've only been taken the supplements for 30 days. I can't weight (wait) to see the results in about 3-4 months of taking this product..
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great value
customer_reviews.text: I don't know all the scientific stuff that goes in to this product but I can speak to how this product makes me feel. Typically, once I start eating I have a hard time stopping. Two to three servings was the norm, if not more. This product helps my body remind itself we're only eating for one. I really like that the capsules are vegan, too.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for awhile and have lost a little weight. I also exercise and eat well so I think this product works in conjunction with a healthy lifestyle. I will be buying again in the future if I continue to see the effects! I also am a pretty active person so I don't know if the effects were also because of that. I will continue to track it and try to write a follow up review in the future.
customer_reviews.author: SC12

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Just finished one bottle and will be getting another one. I used this to burn fat and for energy. I honestly think it works since I felt less energy on the days I went with out taking it. It also speeded up my metabolism. I also got my sister to take these and she wants me to order another one too
customer_reviews.author: K. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great for leaning out
customer_reviews.text: I used the green coffee bean extract as a way to cut a few pounds and lean out. I followed the instructions on the packaging and it worked very well. I kept my workouts and meal plans the same. I was able to maintain my muscle mass and cut the fat to be able to lean out.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great product - instant results
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Saw immediate results in appetite suppression along with modest weight loss (coupled with a workout regimen). No adverse affects or anxiety (such as with those highly-caffeinated supplements). Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: It works and it is a great alternative to coffee
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product and the concept in general. Has a kick of the coffee but faster and does not occupy the stomach space. Additionally, the way the pills are better that coffee or tea is that it does not have the tannin that does not get of the body and is a bad thing in general.
customer_reviews.author: FN

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I bought the this supplement because I had read it has detoxification qualities, as an added bonus it gives me some energy without getting jittery.
customer_reviews.author: Feffer

customer_reviews.title: Good for weight loss!
customer_reviews.text: I take two tablets three times a day and I used the whole container to see the effects! Obviously working out is good or keeping up with your exercise daily but this stops your cravings! I would eat healthy, salads, yogurts, oatmeal, eggs, grilled chicken, veggies, etc and usually I think I can eat more than what I usually think my portion would be, but I can't even finish my meals or I would get full quicker! I love this green bean extract and I will keep on buying it, because it does the job honestly :)
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra

customer_reviews.title: Initial Review...will post an update after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I have taken green coffee bean extract before (a different brand) however and I love the results I had taking it. I purchased this brand after much research and review and I am giving it 3 stars only because I haven't seen any results from taking it as of now but I am assuming it is because I have not been taken it long enough. My plan it to taken it for 3 months consecutively and come back with an updated honest review of this product.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: I think I will know more about if this is a good product once I finish this bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this for about two weeks and it seems to be helping me not snack as often. I also noticed a slight lift in energy and mood. I often times only take it once a day and about 30 minutes before a meal. Combining this supplement with healthy eating, drinking lots of water and exercise should help bring the desired results. I think I will know more about if this is a good product once I finish this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my weight goals
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use this for nutritional support and weight loss/maintenance. We have found it to be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Trying it out
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying this product out for weight loss. I've heard some great things so we will see.
customer_reviews.author: shauna89

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: i take one 1st thing in the morning before breakfast. by time i get to work, i'm not very hungry. i take another before lunch and I usually forget to eat because I'm not hungry. one thing i love about this product is I get full fast and don't overeat.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement!
customer_reviews.text: The Green Coffee Bean Extract Supplement isn't a magic weight loss pill, BUT it has 100% helped aide in my weight loss journey (I have lost 20 lbs on diet alone, another 25 when I added exercise). I take the pills as directed, 30 minutes before a meal with lots of water, and I find myself feeling more full faster- so eating less. I also feel great energy for a few hours afterwards, allowing me to drink less coffee and go longer without feeling hungry again. They are definitely worth trying!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Schnitzer

product_meta.title: Natural Raw Green Coffee Bean Extract - Extra Strength Pure Premium Antioxidant Beans - 800 mg Max Fat Burner Supplement Super Cleanse Pills for Weight Loss Benefits Reviews
product_meta.description: Color:Green Coffee BeanTap into nature’s tiny secret that’s packed with antioxidant superpowers and natural-source caffeine when you open a bottle of our Green Coffee Extract. You can: -Support Weight Loss -Raise metabolism -Block carbs + sugar -Metabolize sugar more efficiently -Melt Fat -Boost Energy -Detox Liver -Cleanse your body -Lower blood sugar -Have healthier cholesterol Green Coffee is rejuvenating, energizing and cleansing. It’s antioxidant ability works hard to detox and flush fat from your liver, getting you into fat-burning mode (low carb.) Add this amazing supplement to your routine for a weight loss surge and rev to your entire system. How does it work? Green Coffee Extract (GCE) contains chlorogenic acid (CGA), a powerful natural extract that boosts the function of a fat-blocking enzyme called adiponectin, effectively strengthening your body’s fat “immune system” and reducing the amount of adipose tissue stored on the body. Green coffee beans also contain high levels of pure, natural caffeine—a well-known diet aid, appetite suppressant and energy improver. We only source the highest quality, purest natural ingredients to pack into our powerful supplements. We guarantee your 100% satisfaction. Contact us, and let us know how this Green Coffee Extract supercharges your health efforts and helps you burn calories and stay active all day!
feature_bullets: RAISE METABOLISM – Rev your metabolic burning capacity with ingredients sourced from pure raw green coffee – roasted beans lose most of their chlorogenic acid – this supplement boosts energy
BURN FAT + LOSE WEIGHT – Unroasted green coffee beans retain their chlorogenic acid + more caffeine which block carbs – boosts metabolism – inhibits weight gain – a potent – pure + well known extract
BOOST METABOLISM + ENERGY – Stay raw – roasted beans lose most of their chlorogenic acid – our supplement revs your metabolism with the weight loss gold power combination raw coffee + caffeine
CLEANSE + DETOX – Flush fat from your liver with organic way to cleanse your cells using powerful antioxidants – 800 mg Svetol – CGA – active ingredient that speeds up fat loss – trimming + slimming
STABILIZE GLUCOSE LEVELS – Lowering blood sugar drastically improves cholesterol levels in the blood – better sugar metabolism reduces sugar + carb absorption while also lowering blood pressure
